modShortDescription: This mod changes the dynamic of books and schematics! When you read them... they still exist! You can share, sell, trade, or scrap your old books!
modDescription:
This mod changes the dynamic of books and schematics! When you read themâ€¦ they still exist! You can share, sell, trade, or scrap your old [books](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-books/)! Interestingly, it provides a different component of teamplay.

For balance purposes, [experience](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-experience/) points were removed from reading books and schematics. Have fun making a library, or scrapping them into paper for that shotgun ammo.

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/15fDxqXZKAF4CkrOOzf8qv4E9C2RSZ88_/view?usp=sharing)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/22291-riles-reusable-schematics/).

**Credits:** [Riles](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/riles/)
